Event: In 2025, City Y will become a megacity. How could\nthis happen? Let's go back to the beginning
To begin with, City Y emerged with a population of\n10 thousand
Then, the mayor began to stimulate the economy
Then, more jobs were created and more immigrants\ncame
Then, economic growth led to better healthcare and\nless death rate
Then, City Y has a population of 800 thousand
Then, experts predict that the population will\ncontinue to increase
Then, the population will pass 2 million
Then, the bigger population will make the city keep\nexpanding
Then, the population will pass 4 million
At last, it will become a megacity
